summary: CIAO! MANHATTAN parallels Andy Warhol Factory star Edie Sedgwick's glory days in the late 1960s through her inevitable downfall and the tragic addiction that would take her life only weeks after filming wrapped in 1971.
cast: Edie Sedgwick|Wesley Hayes|Isabel Jewell|Jeff Briggs|Paul America|Tom Flye|Gabriel Lampa|Pat Hartley|Nell Bassett|Charlie Bacis|Jane Holzer|David Weisman|Wesley Rand|Viva|Roger Vadim|Brigid Berlin|Lilimor Mercer|Rosko|Lorenzo|Titus|Allen Ginsberg|Christian Marquand|John Nahan|Jean Margouleff|Nena Thurman|Richie Berlin|Robert Thurman
keywords: topless female nudity|new york city|sex in a swimming pool|celebrity|nymphomania
title: Ciao Manhattan
